product_vision:
Create a basic personal task management application that allows users to:
- Create and manage personal tasks
- Set task priorities (High, Medium, Low)
- Mark tasks as complete or incomplete
- View task lists organized by priority

This should be a simple, focused MVP for individual productivity.

epics.title: Task Creation and Management
epics.description: Enable users to create, edit, and delete personal tasks to manage their daily activities effectively. This epic focuses on providing a seamless interface for task input and basic organization.
epics.business_value: Drives core user engagement by fulfilling the fundamental need for task tracking, targeting 80% adoption among new users
success_criteria: Users can create a task in under 10 seconds
90% of test users report ease of task creation and management
risks: Overcomplicating the UI could reduce usability
Performance issues with large task lists

epics.title: Task Priority Setting
epics.description: Allow users to assign priority levels (High, Medium, Low) to tasks to help them focus on what matters most. This feature will enable better decision-making and time management for users.
epics.business_value: Increases user satisfaction by 20% through enhanced control over task importance
success_criteria: Users can set priority for 100% of tasks
Priority settings are reflected in task views instantly
risks: Users may misuse priority levels, leading to cluttered workflows

epics.title: Task Completion Tracking
epics.description: Provide functionality for users to mark tasks as complete or incomplete to track their progress. This epic ensures users can visualize their achievements and stay motivated.
epics.business_value: Boosts user retention by 15% through a sense of accomplishment and progress tracking
success_criteria: Users can toggle task status between complete/incomplete in one click
Completion status updates reflect across all views
risks: Accidental status changes could frustrate users

epics.title: Priority-Based Task List Views
epics.description: Enable users to view and filter task lists organized by priority levels (High, Medium, Low) for better focus. This epic delivers a structured way to approach tasks based on importance.
epics.business_value: Improves user productivity by 25% by reducing decision fatigue through organized views
success_criteria: Users can filter tasks by priority in under 5 seconds
100% of tasks display correctly in priority-sorted views
risks: Complex filtering logic could impact app performance
Users may struggle with navigation between views
